Alpha Beta Gamer

“Tea Party Simulator shows much [more] promise than the rest of the simulator games out there. The humor is quite present and hidden Easter Eggs just makes it more fun to play.”
Critically Honest Gamer

“Ha-ble ... dhey! My na ma da buffoon!”
Markiplier

About This Game

Ever wanted to be a tea party extraordinaire? Well now you can.

  • Brew the tea, pour the tea, serve the tea.
  • Serve biscuits and cake.
  • Try not to mess it up too bad, or your guest will get angry
  • Find the hidden easter eggs
  • You know... all that good tea party stuff

Each new level brings it's own challenges you must overcome on your quest to become the ultimate tea party master.

Comes with the original Tea Party Mode and now a Mode 2 (after beating all the levels), for a whole new tea experience!
READ MORE

Not Recommended

Posted: June 29
I felt like my fingers were the size of a Dwarven warhammer trying to fit them into the eye of a needle.
I just don't have the patience to master the controls to the degree of granularity required to have any degree of success.
My single success in the game was to slap the plate off the table and it landed under the table and I pushed it onto the glowing ring and Ted was satisfied. I think I'll call it a day on this game and go elsewhere.

Recommended
3.1 hrs on record
Posted: October 14
Tea Party Simulator 2015™

Overview
Tea Party Simulator 2015™ is a new ' random table ' game.
In Tea Party Simulator 2015™ you are preparing tea for your teddy, but it's not so easy as it sounds it is, it's very likely that you would knock down cups, teapots, cakes and other stuff.
This game contains 28 steam achievements, one of the achievement you just get when you break everything and smash everything to the ground and in the air.
As they say, practice makes perfect, and this – together with a great deal of patience – is precisely what you need to move from level to level in this game.
You only play with a left hand, and that's all you are allowed to use to make tea, server cake slices, cookies and more.
if you fail, and everyone fails at least once, you can restart the mission, everytime you restart, there will be a different table layout, unless you turn that option off.
I have read there are a few easter-eggs, but I couldn't find one yet.
Tea Party Simulator 2015™ looks like Surgeon Simulator, but now you doesn't have to operate somebody.

In my opinion
This game is fun to play, but in my opinion the price is a bit to high, maybe because it's a new game?
The game is a bit like Surgeon Simulator, you have to do everything with one hand, what makes the game funny, but if you fails over and over the game gets a bit tedious.
I would recommend this game if you like simulators with a lot of funny things.

Pros & Cons

+ Pros
+ It's very funny game to play.
+ The graphics are really nice, you can play on beautiful so it's looks more real (even you play with only a left hand).
+ Cool environments. (The beach, Airplane, more)

- Cons
- It's a pricy game, I got it as a gift.
- The boards, cups, breakes really fast. (the mission was loaded and everything was already broken in the plane)

Rating
I liked to play this game so I give it a 7, It's a nice game with several missions.
The graphics are really good, even if you got a bad computer you can play this game on medium or low, but if you got a good pc, you can play this game on beatiful.

If you found this review helpful and want to see more recommended games, be sure to follow our curator group: Follow here!
